The Mosque of tius√©n is a comparatively modern building,
whirl was erected to enshrine the head 111 11115111. 51111 1:11 "1111,
the son-in-law of the Prophet; he was slain at the. 11111111111 ef
1111111111111, .-1.11. 17111121. The head was that sent to Damascus, 111111
1111111 1111 11111111, and was preserved in a chest of silu-r which is
huried tmdtergrtotond, ibn Juiotr says that the mosque contained a Hack stone in which the whole person of the beholder
was rciletted as "in an Indian steel mirror newly polished,"
and that he saw the people kissing and embracing the tomb in
transports of deviation and affection.

The Masque Al-Azher, Lea. "the 11e5p1e1111ent," was
founded by Gawhar, the general of the 111-111111111 11111111111111, 1111
1111111111111, 31111111 3,111, eye, and it was finished on June 24th,
ma. The mosque was turned into a university in 5133, and at
the present time it is the largest university in the Muslim
world. Very little of the original building, new remains, for
the restorations which have been made in ancient and modern
times have 11111111 1111111 1.1151511111111111; 111 11111 nineteenth century
Sa'id Pasha and Tawfik l'asha carried nut some most important
works of repair. The mosque has six gates, but is usually

. Lane, Cairo Fifty Fears Ago, p. 44.
